actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to decrease the limitation on deductions for medical expense to 2 percent of adjusted gross income, to eliminate the 1-percent limitation on deductions for drugs and medicine and to include the entire deduction for medical insurance within the 2-percent limitation.

summary.text: Decreases the limitation on deductions for medical expenses under the Internal Revenue Code to 2 percent of adjusted gross income. Includes the entire deduction for medical insurance within the 2-percent limitation. Eliminates the 1-percent limitation on deductions for drugs and medicine.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to decrease the limitation on deductions for medical expense to 2 percent of adjusted gross income, to eliminate the 1-percent limitation on deductions for drugs and medicine and to include the entire deduction for medical insurance within the 2-percent limitation.
